com.thedemgel.cititradersre

Class InventoryHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thedemgel.cititradersre.InventoryHandler

  • public class InventoryHandler
extends Object
    Create and store temporary Inventories for all stores/players Each time a player opens an inventory from a store they will generate a new Inventory, when that inventory is closed, anything that is purchased will be double checked against what the NPC has, and then all items will attempted to be put into the players inventory.
